ygData.subject: Re: New person to the list not new to EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Carey I ve got a high elf chanty too, but she s only 32 - she ll get up there one day though :) I ve had awful issues with loot as well both in the dungeons
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Carey

I've got a high elf chanty too, but she's only 32 - she'll get up
there one day though :)

I've had awful issues with loot as well both in the dungeons and out
of it. I know that having one main looter is probably the easiest,
but sheesh, when they log (and i think some of them just disconnect
when they've had enough without splitting) without splitting it can
get really hard.

I guess we'll all learn the perfect loot method some day.

Cheers
T

isobella 32 chanter

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> Hi Carey! Welcome to the group.
> All new accounts are moderated so messages won't be posted right
away. I had to do that to block spam and porn links.
> Really my moderator does all the work as I've been having email
problems alot.
> luv,
> -Su
>
> Hello all!
>
> I just thought I would introduce myself. My name is
> Cary. I'm 25 years old married. Both my husband and I
> play EQ. He is the one that got me hooked.
>
> My Characters:
> Venetia Valgrave - Lvl 43 Ench High elf - Currently
> gaining exp to dungeon groups and not liking it
>
> Clawdya Valgrave Lvl 23 - Beastlord Kitty - Currently
> in PC
>
> I play on the the Tarew Marr server with my husband
> Morrdak Valgrave who is a lvl 52 Iksar SK. Also a
> bunch of My RL friends play on that server. We all
> have the family name of Valgrave. Its pretty funny.
> Hehe
>
> I'm trying to level to 46 as quickly as possible so I
> can level in POJ with my friends who are in their 50's
> now. It sucks not being able to level with them. The
> Dungeon groups suck because everybody is sooo rude and
> I have been jipped out of split 4 times now.
>
> Well I just thought I would introduce myself!
>
> Cary
>
